Aniket's Notes

AL=1+CL2A_L=\frac{1+CL}{2}AL​=21+CL​ Sample example: We want Z score for confidence level CL=95% $A_L = \frac{1+0.95}{2}=0.975$ Since this table is from 0 to Z, we do $0.975-0.5=0.475$ We search Z for 0.475 which is 1.96
